column1: Hey, just a reminder that our team meeting has been moved to Thursday at 2 PM. Let me know if that still works for you.
URGENT: Your account has been temporarily locked due to suspicious activity. Please verify your information immediately to avoid permanent suspension.
Can you review the document I sent earlier and give feedback by the end of the day?
We noticed an unusual sign-in attempt from a new device. If this was not you, confirm your identity within 24 hours to secure your account.
Lunch plans are still on for noon today if you’re free.
Your mailbox has exceeded its storage limit. Upgrade now to continue receiving important messages.
Please find the attached invoice for last month’s services. Let me know if you have any questions.
A payment of $947.22 could not be processed. Review your billing information now to prevent service interruption.
Just checking in to see if you’re available for a quick call this afternoon.
Security alert: Your password will expire today. Failure to reset your password may result in restricted access.
The server maintenance is scheduled for tonight at 11 PM. Expect brief downtime.
Congratulations! You have been selected for an exclusive reward. Act fast before this offer expires.
Here are the notes from yesterday’s meeting. Thanks again for your input.
We detected multiple failed login attempts. Verify your account ownership to restore full access.
Final notice: Legal action may be taken if your account verification is not completed immediately.
